pr_title: Implement support for always projecting fields by name.

timeline.message: Implement support for always projecting fields by name.
Implement support for always projecting fields by name.

timeline.bodyText: If the name is already escaped(replaced "$" to "$$"), could it happen to a case that we did a second replaceAll escape to make it un-readable.
timeline.author: BrianPin

replies.bodyText: Field names in the data are never escaped. We only escape them in the mask tree as it has special meaning for $ (eg $*, $start etc)
replies.author: karthikbalasub

timeline.bodyText: Do you think since this adding field is in response, maybe this projectFields should be in Response Util class instead of Rest Utils?
timeline.author: BrianPin

replies.bodyText:
We can move, unfortunately this is a public API and so we cannot delete it.
If this is not a big concern, I prefer to do this refactoring in a different PR. The current PR is already large.
replies.author: karthikbalasub
